channel.title: FPS on PRG-YouTube
channel.description: Recent content in FPS on PRG-YouTube

item.title: Ruins Re... FPS Edition -NORMAL-, by buttRcaT | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3463
item.description: Description of this map: HEY! WHERE’D THE TITLE GO??? I nerfed the GORT Temples lol, good luck sitting there doing nothing :) Also emitters buffed because I can. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here! https://youtu.be/fBQpSOAzV14 Tags on this video: ‘CW’, ‘CW4’, ‘Creeper’, ‘Creeper World’, ‘Creeper World 4’, ‘Creeper World Gameplay’, ‘Creeper World Guide’, ‘Creeper World Walkthrough’, ‘Defense’, ‘Efficient’, ‘FPS’, ‘First Person Shooter’, ‘Game’, ‘Gameplay’, ‘Gaming’, ‘Liquid’, ‘PRG’, ‘RTS’, ‘Real Time Strategy’, ‘Real-Time Strategy’, ‘Ruins Re… FPS Edition -NORMAL- by buttRcaT | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3463’, ‘Speed Run’, ‘Speed-Run’, ‘Speedrun’, ‘Strategy’, ‘Survival’, ‘Tips’, ‘Tower Defense’, ‘Tsunami’, ‘Video Game’, ‘Water’, ‘World’, “let’s play”

item.title: Hints FPS Edition, by buttRcaT | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3469
item.description: Description of this map: Ima stop putting the difficulty I think the title deserves in, because a wise hooman told me not to :) I’ll put the difficulty in a tag instead, no idea why I put them in the title lmao. I’ll start to ramp up the difficulty at War and Peace :) I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: Farsite FPS Edition -EASY-, by buttRcaT | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3419
item.description: Description of this map: The emitter things emit 4X the original amount of creeper, also every minute they send out a larger wave. You’ll have to pay alot more attention to your surroundings here, as the creeper is attacking from all sides… Also stand ontop the temple for a nice view, if you’ve got the time : ) I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: Not My Mars FPS Edition -EASY-, by buttRcaT | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3455
item.description: Description of this map: Won’t be doing the first Farsite Expedition map as the map doesn’t like the scripts :P I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? item.title: Home FPS Edition -EASY-, by buttRcaT | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3290
item.description: Description of this map: I might make all the farsite missions FPS maps? For some reason I can’t change where you spawn, but it isn’t a problem in this map. I will try make a proper FPS map soon… Scripts by Auri and Qople I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube?

item.title: FPS: The New Generation, by Kaiden | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3289
item.description: Description of this map: The sleeper has returned again, and this time they’re back with more tricks up their sleeves! The older drones were a failure in stopping you, so they have created a new generation of drones that shoot at you from a distance to try to stop you! Just make sure you don’t get hit by the bullets. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: So I Heard You Like Eggs [FPS], by rien | Creeper World 4 Colonies #2072
item.description: Description of this map: You remember that map? well FPS time, you cant cheat the crap out of it }:D I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here! https://youtu.be/cNnzRLwbhHM Tags on this video: ‘CW’, ‘CW4’, ‘Creeper’, ‘Creeper World’, ‘Creeper World 4’, ‘Creeper World Gameplay’, ‘Creeper World Guide’, ‘Creeper World Walkthrough’, ‘Defense’, ‘Efficient’, ‘FPS’, ‘First Person Shooter’, ‘Game’, ‘Gameplay’, ‘Gaming’, ‘Liquid’, ‘PRG’, ‘RTS’, ‘Real Time Strategy’, ‘Real-Time Strategy’, ‘So I Heard You Like Eggs [FPS] by rien | Creeper World 4 Colonies #2072’, ‘Speed Run’, ‘Speed-Run’, ‘Speedrun’, ‘Strategy’, ‘Survival’, ‘Tips’, ‘Tower Defense’, ‘Tsunami’, ‘Video Game’, ‘Water’, ‘World’

item.title: Autobuild FPS 4, by Auri | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1179
item.description: Description of this map: Another Autobuild map where the AI builds out in a designated pattern while you run around in first person. There’s a new tool, as well as an ability to be earned. First person mode by qople, rebuilding script by WithersChat. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube?

item.title: FPS: Return to Bunker, by Heritor | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1324
item.description: Description of this map: One of our bunkers has been overrun with creeper so it’s up to you to clear it out! Credit to Qople for the FPS mode and Auri for the tooling and upgrader. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here! https://youtu.

item.title: Autobuild FPS 5, by Auri | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1260
item.description: Description of this map: Another Autobuild map where the AI builds out in a designated pattern while you run around in first person. There is now an upgrade system that you can spend points in. (Let me know if you think that system is great, or terrible.) First person mode by qople. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: Autobuild FPS 5, by Auri | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1260
item.description: Description of this map: Another Autobuild map where the AI builds out in a designated pattern while you run around in first person. There is now an upgrade system that you can spend points in. (Let me know if you think that system is great, or terrible.) First person mode by qople. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: FPS: Hangar, by Kaiden | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1434
item.description: Description of this map: This is basically a recreation of the first level of Doom in CW4. It’s not a perfect recreation, since some features, like doors, are missing, but it’s quite close. The nukage won’t damage you if you step in them, so don’t worry about touching them, though there’s creeper breeder under them. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: Colosseum of Creep (FPS), by qople | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1223
item.description: Description of this map: Testing an upgrade system that scales over time. It affects both you and the creeper, and activates every minute. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here! https://youtu.be/4yhlAzx7VsE Tags on this video: ‘Creeper’, ‘Creeper World Gameplay’, ‘Creeper World Guide’, ‘RTS’, ‘Gameplay’, ‘Liquid’, ‘Creeper World 4’, ‘Creeper World Walkthrough’, ‘World’, ‘Water’, ‘Survival’, ‘Real Time Strategy’, ‘Tsunami’, ‘PRG’, ‘Real-Time Strategy’, ‘CW4’, ‘Speed-Run’, ‘Strategy’, ‘Tower Defense’, ‘Creeper World’, ‘Defense’, ‘FPS’, ‘Defend’, ‘Speed Run’, ‘First Person Shooter’, ‘Game’, ‘Speedrun’, ‘CW’, ‘Video Game’, ‘Gaming’, ‘Tips’, ‘Efficient’, ‘Colosseum of Creep (FPS) by qople | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1223’

item.description: Description of this map: An Autopilot FPS level, using a few of Auri’s additions for their autobuild levels. I added a basic queueing system to the upgrades. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? item.title: EP 1: Assault (FPS, Autobuild), by Ankheg | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1427
item.description: Description of this map: Assault on Fort Creep. An FPS map with autobuild using mods from Auri and Witherschat. Normal Dificulty. Using mods from Withers, Auri, and Qopl. Mods were taken from Autobuild FPS 5. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here! https://youtu.be/srNx-AnfDTg

item.title: FPS: Dark World, by Kaiden | Creeper World 4 Colonies #2580
item.description: Description of this map: This world is pretty dark to the point where your visibility is limited (but you can turn that off), and of course creeper is everywhere, as well as some glowing plant life? This is possibly the most complicated-looking level I’ve ever made, but it’s actually rather simple. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: FPS: Ported Over, by qople | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1319
item.description: Description of this map: First person stargates. Because naturally. Credit goes to Auri for the base stargate scripts. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? item.title: Canyon Battle [FPS], by AtomicCarrot | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1610
item.description: Description of this map: Fight the violent waves of creeper inside the cliffs of the canyon, and help the AI gain ground. This map uses Auri and Heritor’s FPS Tools, Qople’s FPS Core and Autopilot, and Heritor’s SleeperCore. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here!

item.title: FPS: AI Assistance, by Kaiden | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1652
item.description: Description of this map: An sleeper FPS map with autopilot. Fight hordes of sleeper units and destroy the creeper with the help of AI! This map shouldn’t be too challenging, and also shouldn’t be a slog. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here! https://youtu.

item.title: FPS: All Your Base, by Heritor | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1750
item.description: Description of this map: The Sleeper has continued to learn from us. It now constructs a twisted parody of our own bases - the only way to stop this is to take out the Sleeper Labs! I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here! https://youtu.

item.title: Test Site 3, by Jamzs3-AU [FPS] | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1501
item.description: Description of this map: Base map for ADA, FPS, Autobuild AI, Thor AI. New Decals such as text plates. Mesh dirt roads. Assist the AI in expanding the base. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? item.title: FPS: Green Green Grass of Home, by Heritor | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1488
item.description: Description of this map: You’ve been called to this system to help recover an experimental device that could turn the tide of many embattled worlds. Fight your way to this device and use it’s power to help you destroy the Sleeper lurking somewhere on this planet. FPS code & tools by Qople and Auri. Autopilot by Qople. FPS bridge & FPS Sleeper by Heritor. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.title: FPS: Pine Gap v2 (Fixed), by Heritor | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1421
item.description: Description of this map: Fight your way to the rift lab and power the totems in this FPS level - Now with working AI and less chance of collision! FPS mode by Qople. FPS Tools by Auri. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here!

item.title: FPS: The Sleeper Awakens, by Heritor | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1448
item.description: Description of this map: The creeper has noticed your movements, and has dispatched a sleeper to provide a more “personal” touch. FPS code & tools by Qople and Auri. FPS bridge & FPS Sleeper by Heritor. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here! https://youtu.

item.title: Doom E1M1 (FPS), by Kaiden | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1412
item.description: Description of this map: This is basically an prototype version of what will be a recreation of the first map in Doom. This is also a FPS map. You might want to move a bit quick, the creeper will get out of control if you’re not careful. Also try to avoid bumping into the walls, it will make you stuck. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: FPS: Streets of Rage, by Heritor | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1503
item.description: Description of this map: Traffic can be a pain, but it’s even worse when Sleeper co-opts the vehicles! FPS code & tools by Qople and Auri. Autopilot by Qople. FPS bridge & FPS Sleeper by Heritor. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here! https://youtu.

item.title: FPS: Sleeper Dungeon, by Kaiden (Multiplayer) | Creeper World 4 MVerse #1573
item.description: Description of this map: A FPS map that takes place in a dungeon full of sleeper units. There are 3 new sleeper units in this map, and there are 6 zones. Many issues from the early version of this map has been fixed for the most part, so this means there won’t be excessive creeper in rooms that aren’t meant to have a lot of creeper, and sleeper weapons are easier to kill.

item.title: AutoBuild FPS 8, by Auri | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1532
item.description: Description of this map: Another fps Autobuild map where the AI builds out in a designated pattern. First person mode by qople. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here! https://youtu.be/AaUAVNSmGPQ Tags on this video: ‘CW’, ‘CW4’, ‘Creeper’, ‘Creeper World’, ‘Creeper World 4’, ‘Creeper World Gameplay’, ‘Creeper World Guide’, ‘Creeper World Walkthrough’, ‘Defend’, ‘Defense’, ‘FPS’, ‘First Person Shooter’, ‘Game’, ‘Gameplay’, ‘Liquid’, ‘PRG’, ‘RTS’, ‘Real Time Strategy’, ‘Real-Time Strategy’, ‘Speed Run’, ‘Speed-Run’, ‘Speedrun’, ‘Strategy’, ‘Survival’, ‘Tower Defense’, ‘Tsunami’, ‘Water’, ‘World’, ‘Video Game’, ‘Gaming’, ‘Tips’, ‘Efficient’, ‘AutoBuild FPS 8 by Auri | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1532’

item.title: FPS: Blown Away, by Kaiden | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1662
item.description: Description of this map: An Sleeper FPS map with autopilot. There are 2 new enemies in this map, and one of them is pretty explosive, and the other is pretty speedy but weak. I’ve also made it so that the moving enemies don’t all spawn at once at the very beginning of the game. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: FPS: Moving Sleeper Units, by Kaiden | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1624
item.description: Description of this map: An open-world sleeper fps map with 3 new enemies, all of which can move and can be sniped. The new enemies will create creeper wherever it goes, and they’re spawned from the spawners. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here!

item.title: FPS: Get the Horns, by Heritor | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1591
item.description: Description of this map: After your escape from Minos, we’ve made some advancements in developing counters to the Sleeper. Unfortunately, we’re not the only one pursuing R&D. FPS code & tools by Qople and Auri. FPS bridge by Qople & Heritor Autopilot by Qople. FPS Sleeper by Heritor. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG

item.title: FPS: Platform Peril, by Heritor | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1387
item.description: Description of this map: Work your way high and low through this abandoned factory to cut off the source of the creeper peril, but beware - Forbs are roaming the grounds! I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? item.title: Autobuild FPS 3, by Auri | Creeper World 4 Colonies #878
item.description: Description of this map: An experimental variant based on the FPS mod by Qople. There’s been an accident, and one of the simpler AIs has control over the rift lab and construction. Enter first person mode and help clear the terrain, the AI will assist you in holding it, but it’s not very flexible, so you have to work with it a bit. First person scripts - Qople Rebuilding script - WithersChat

item.title: FPS Plus One, by qople | Creeper World 4 Colonies #962
item.description: Description of this map: Inspired by Auri’s “Autobuild FPS” (#878), introducing Autopilot, a directable AI that controls player units. Work alongside it in first person as you beat back the creeper. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here! https://youtu.be/pWQEECCpHAM Tags on this video: ‘Creeper’, ‘Creeper World Gameplay’, ‘Creeper World Guide’, ‘RTS’, ‘Gameplay’, ‘Liquid’, ‘Creeper World 4’, ‘Creeper World Walkthrough’, ‘World’, ‘Water’, ‘Survival’, ‘Real Time Strategy’, ‘Tsunami’, ‘PRG’, ‘Real-Time Strategy’, ‘CW4’, ‘Speed-Run’, ‘Strategy’, ‘Tower Defense’, ‘Creeper World’, ‘Defense’, ‘FPS’, ‘Defend’, ‘Speed Run’, ‘First Person Shooter’, ‘Game’, ‘Speedrun’, ‘CW’, ‘Video Game’, ‘Gaming’, ‘Tips’, ‘Efficient’, ‘FPS Plus One by qople | Creeper World 4 Colonies #962’

item.title: FPS: The Hill, by qople | Creeper World 4 Colonies #990
item.description: Description of this map: After whacking some sense into the malfunctioning autopilot systems and teaching it a few lessons, you see a pretty swell swell in the ground. As good a place as any to land. Uses a modified and rebalanced version of Auri’s energy upgrade system. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG

item.title: FPS: Whole Wide World, by qople | Creeper World 4 Colonies #872
item.description: Description of this map: Trying out a more open level design. No locked weapons, no locked doors. Well, one locked door. Collect any 12 info caches to open it. The level scales as you progress, so don’t worry about an “intended path.” There is none. Some areas are harder than others, though, and better left for later. Changes include support for high FPS and a wiki. More on the forum for those interested.

item.title: Autobuild FPS 2, by Auri | Creeper World 4 Colonies #967
item.description: Description of this map: Wander around and fight in Qople’s fps mod while buildings are automatically built. This is still the same system with the unit positions laid out in advance. Improved the AI handling a bit, and added a new upgrade system and a unique perk – A Thor that follows you once it’s built. First person scripts - Qople Rebuilding script - WithersChat I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.title: Autobuild FPS, by Auri | Creeper World 4 Colonies #878
item.description: Description of this map: An experimental variant based on the FPS mod by Qople. There’s been an accident, and one of the simpler AIs has control over the rift lab and construction. Enter first person mode and help clear the terrain, the AI will assist you in holding it, but it’s not very flexible, so you have to work with it a bit. item.title: FPS: Upgraded, by qople | Creeper World 4 Colonies #467
item.description: Description of this map: Ask and ye shall receive! A much more substantial first-person level exploring and expanding what the gamemode has to offer. (There’s no significance to the empty right side of the map, there’s just no easy way to resize maps.) If it doesn’t look like you’re making progress in an area after a few minutes, there’s probably another area you can clear first to get upgrades. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.title: First Person Creeper World, by qople [FPS] | Creeper World 4 Colonies #341
item.description: Description of this map: We all knew it was only a matter of time. For some reason, you can’t place a command node on this planet, forcing you to descend from orbit yourself and fight the creeper on the ground. If people are interested in more first person maps, I will continue improving the cpack. (additional polish, maybe new weapons, etc.) Feedback is appreciated, positive or negative. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!
